00043 /* Set all our counts to three for the three possible genotypes:
00044    AA,AB,BB */
00045 ClusterStats::ClusterStats() {
00046   counts.resize(3);
00047   aMeans.resize(3);
00048   aVars.resize(3);
00049   mMeans.resize(3);
00050   mVars.resize(3);
00051   covars.resize(3);
00052 }

00054 /**
00055  * Write out a text representation of the prior to the file specified.
00056  * @param prior - Prior to be written.
00057  * @param out - ostream to write to.
00058  */
00059 void x_writePriorOut(ClusterPrior &prior, std::ostream &out,
00060                                const char *fieldDelim, const char *sep) {
00061   printColumnVector(prior.centers, &out, sep);
00062   out << fieldDelim;
00063   printColumnVector(prior.centerVars, &out, sep);
00064   out << fieldDelim;
00065   printMatrix(prior.covars, &out, sep);
00066   out << endl;
00067 }
00068 
00069 /**
00070  * Generate a string representation of a snp model.
00071  * @return string - text description of snp clusters.
00072  */
00073 std::string x_getModelString(string m_ProbesetName, ClusterPrior *m_CurrentPrior) {
00074   int i = 0, j = 0;
00075   std::string s = m_ProbesetName;
00076   s += "\t";
00077   for(i = 0; i < m_CurrentPrior->centers.Nrows() - 1; i++) {
00078     s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->centers.element(i));
00079     s += ",";
00080   }
00081   s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->centers.element(i));
00082   s += "\t";
00083   for(i = 0; i < m_CurrentPrior->centerVars.Nrows() - 1; i++) {
00084     s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->centerVars.element(i));
00085     s += ",";
00086   }
00087   s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->centerVars.element(i));
00088   s += "\t";
00089   for(i = 0; i < m_CurrentPrior->covars.Nrows()-1; i++) {
00090     for(j = 0; j < m_CurrentPrior->covars.Ncols(); j++) {
00091       s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->covars.element(i,j));
00092       s += ",";
00093     }
00094   }
00095   for(j = 0; j < m_CurrentPrior->covars.Ncols() - 1; j++) {
00096     s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->covars.element(i,j));
00097     s += ",";
00098   }
00099   s += ToStr(m_CurrentPrior->covars.element(i,j));
00100   return s;
00101 }

00104 /**
00105  * Write out a text representation of the prior to the file specified.
00106  * @param prior
00107  * @param fileName
00108  */
00109 void x_writePrior(ClusterPrior &prior, const char *fileName) {
00110   static const char *fieldDelim = "\t", *sep=",";
00111   ofstream out;
00112   Fs::mustOpenToWrite(out, fileName);
00113   out.setf(ios::fixed, ios::floatfield);
00114   out.precision(10);
00115   out << "center" << fieldDelim << "var" << fieldDelim << "center.var" << endl;
00116   x_writePriorOut(prior, out, fieldDelim, sep);
00117 }
00118 /**
00119  * Covert string representations into ClusterPrior
00120  *
00121  * @param id - identifying string.
00122  * @param center - centers.
00123  * @param var - variance of center variances.
00124  * @param covar - covariance of centers.
00125  *
00126  * @return - ClusterPrior.
00127  */
00128 ClusterPrior x_clusterPriorFromStrings(const char *fileName, std::string &id, std::string &center,
00129                                                  std::string &var, std::string &covar) {
00130   ClusterPrior prior;
00131   vector<float> vec;
00132   vector<string> words;
00133 
00134   prior.id = id;
00135 
00136   /* Read in the centers. */
00137   Util::chopString(center, ',', words);
00138   vec.clear();
00139   if(words.size() != 6)
00140     Err::errAbort("Expecting 6 entires in 'center' entry in file: " + ToStr(fileName) + " got: " + ToStr(words.size()));
00141   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00142     vec.push_back(Convert::toDouble(words[i].c_str()));
00143   }
00144   prior.centers = columnVectorFromArray(&vec[0], (int)vec.size());
00145 
00146   /* Read in the variances. */
00147   Util::chopString(var, ',', words);
00148   vec.clear();
00149   if(words.size() != 9)
00150     Err::errAbort("Expecting 9 entires in 'var' entry in file: " + ToStr(fileName) + " got: " + ToStr(words.size()));
00151   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00152     vec.push_back(Convert::toDouble(words[i].c_str()));
00153   }
00154   prior.centerVars = columnVectorFromArray(&vec[0], (int)vec.size());
00155 
00156   /* Do the covariacne matrix. */
00157   Util::chopString(covar, ',', words);
00158   vec.clear();
00159   if(words.size() != 36)
00160     Err::errAbort("Expecting 36 entires in 'centers.var' entry in file: " + ToStr(fileName) + " got: " + ToStr(words.size()));
00161   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00162     vec.push_back(Convert::toDouble(words[i].c_str()));
00163   }
00164   prior.covars = matrixFromArray(&vec[0], (int)vec.size(), 6, 6);
00165   return prior;
00166 
00167 }
00168 /**
00169  * Read the prior from the test file specified.
00170  * @param fileName - Name of file to read from.
00171  * @return - The prior read in from file.
00172  */
00173 ClusterPrior x_loadPrior(const char *fileName) {
00174   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00175   string center, centerVar, var, id="unknown";
00176   ClusterPrior prior;
00177   vector<float> vec;
00178   tsv.open(fileName);
00179   tsv.bind(0,"id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00180   tsv.bind(0,"center", &center, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00181   tsv.bind(0,"var", &var, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00182   tsv.bind(0,"center.var", &centerVar, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00183   if(tsv.nextLevel(0) != affx::TSV_OK) {
00184     Err::errAbort("Didnt' get an entry in file: " + ToStr(fileName));
00185   }
00186   prior = x_clusterPriorFromStrings(fileName, id, center, var, centerVar);
00187   tsv.close();
00188   return prior;
00189 }

00192 /**
00193  * Load in a number of snp specific priors.
00194  * @param snpPriors - map of snp probeset names to priors.
00195  * @param fileName - filename to read priors from.
00196  */
00197 void x_loadSnpPriors(std::map<std::string, ClusterPrior> &snpPriors,
00198                           const char *fileName) {
00199   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00200   string center, centerVar, var, id="unknown";
00201   ClusterPrior prior;
00202   snpPriors.clear();
00203   tsv.open(fileName);
00204   tsv.bind(0,"id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00205   tsv.bind(0,"center", &center, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00206   tsv.bind(0,"var", &var, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00207   tsv.bind(0,"center.var", &centerVar, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00208   while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00209     prior = x_clusterPriorFromStrings(fileName, id, center, var, centerVar);
00210     if(snpPriors.find(prior.id) != snpPriors.end()) {
00211       Err::errAbort("ClusterZ::x_loadSnpPriors() - Id: " + ToStr(prior.id) + " seen multiple times.");
00212     }
00213     snpPriors[prior.id] = prior;
00214   }
00215   tsv.close();
00216 }

00219 /**
00220  * Write out a text representation of the model to the file specified.
00221  * @param model - Model to be written.
00222  * @param out - ostream to write to.
00223  */
00224 void x_writeModelOut(ClusterModel &model, ostream &out, const std::string &name,
00225                                int copies, const char *fieldDelim, const char *sep) {
00226   out << name << fieldDelim << copies << fieldDelim;
00227   printMatrix(model.clusterMeans, &out, sep);
00228   out << fieldDelim;
00229   printMatrix(model.clusterVars, &out, sep);
00230   out << endl;
00231 }
00232 
00233 /**
00234  * Covert string representations into ClusterModel
00235  *
00236  * @param id - identifying string.
00237  * @param center - centers.
00238  * @param var - variance of center variances.
00239  *
00240  * @return - ClusterModel
00241  */
00242 ClusterModel x_clusterModelFromStrings(const char *fileName, std::string &id,
00243                                                  std::string &center, std::string &var) {
00244   ClusterModel model;
00245   vector<float> vec(9);
00246   vector<string> words;
00247   /* Read in the centers. */
00248   Util::chopString(center, ',', words);
00249   vec.clear();
00250   if(words.size() != 6)
00251     Err::errAbort("Expecting 6 entires in 'center' entry in file: " + ToStr(fileName) +
00252                   " got: " + ToStr(words.size()) + " for probest: " + id);
00253   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00254     vec.push_back(Convert::toDouble(words[i].c_str()));
00255   }
00256   model.clusterMeans = matrixFromArray(&vec[0], (int)vec.size(), 6, 1);
00257 
00258   /* Read in the variances. */
00259   Util::chopString(var, ',', words);
00260   vec.clear();
00261   if(words.size() != 9)
00262     Err::errAbort("Expecting 9 entires in 'var' entry in file: " + ToStr(fileName) +
00263                   " got: " + ToStr(words.size()) + " for probest: " + id);
00264   for(unsigned int i = 0; i < words.size(); i++) {
00265     vec.push_back(Convert::toDouble(words[i].c_str()));
00266   }
00267   model.clusterVars = matrixFromArray(&vec[0], (int)vec.size(), 9, 1);
00268   return model;
00269 }
00270 
00271 /**
00272  * Load in a number of snp specific models.
00273  * @param snpModels - map of snp probeset names to models.
00274  * @param fileName - filename to read models from.
00275  */
00276 void x_loadSnpModels(std::map<std::string, ClusterModel> &snpModels,const char *fileName) {
00277   affx::TsvFile tsv;
00278   string center, var, id, copies;
00279   ClusterModel model;
00280   snpModels.clear();
00281   tsv.open(fileName);
00282   tsv.bind(0,"id", &id, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00283   tsv.bind(0,"copies", &copies, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00284   tsv.bind(0,"center", &center, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00285   tsv.bind(0,"var", &var, affx::TSV_BIND_REQUIRED);
00286   while(tsv.nextLevel(0) == affx::TSV_OK) {
00287     model = x_clusterModelFromStrings(fileName, id, center, var);
00288     if(snpModels.find(id) != snpModels.end()) {
00289       Err::errAbort("ClusterZ::x_loadSnpModels() - Id: " + ToStr(id) + " seen multiple times.");
00290     }
00291     snpModels[id + "-" + copies] = model;
00292   }
00293   tsv.close();
00294 }
